item.description:
I learned of Ruth's Chris secret happy hour bar menu while hanging out with drinking buddies Isabel, Jen, Aisha, Janel, Cathie and Gianni. These delicious treats are amazing mini versions of their entrees and priced just right....$3.50 each such as petite filet on garlic toast with bernaise and mini kobe burger to name two. They're ONLY served from 5 PM until 6:30 PM so get there in time to enjoy them. They also have created tasty sangrias red, white, sparkling, ros√© and blackberry.

Join happy hour friends for conversation, laughs and good cheap eats.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5 and hang until 7.

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Park Street subway station (green and red lines), State subway station (orange and blue lines), Government Center subway station (green and blue lines) and South Station (red line & commuter rail) are less than a fifteen minute walk.
